price: 104. Mpe na sima na yango tolobaki na bana ya isalayele ete; bovanda na mabele kasi tango elaka ya mokolo ya suka ekokokaka tokoya na (bino) ebele na lisanga.
arabic: وَقُلۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ لِبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱسۡكُنُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ جِئۡنَا بِكُمۡ لَفِيفٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqul'nā min baʿdihi libanī is'rāīla us'kunū al-arḍa fa-idhā jāa waʿdu al-ākhirati ji'nā bikum lafīfan
